entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support for workload set versions - authoring workload set assets and packages #34282
  • rollback support with SxS manifests and workload sets (write out the file needed for the resolver to read to determine which manifests to load) #34281
  • Baseline manifest SxS support in installer repo for file-based installs #34280
  • Container publish changes in DN8.P6 not adequately documented in release notes #34272
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.7.23374.6] Fail to retarget greenshot app to .NET 8.0 with 'MethodInvoker' ambiguous reference exception between 'System.Windows.Forms.MethodInvoker' and 'System.Reflection.MethodInvoker' #34268

Closed

  • dotnet SDK discovery accepts empty folders as valid SDKs #22322
    Backlog
  • CA2252 warnings with .NET 7 RC1 SDK #28049

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix the end of build install of workloads to always refresh the rollback file #34289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Containers] validate that the normalized repository name is a meaningful name #34286
    Area-Containers
  • Enable "portable" RID graph when targeting .NET 8 and higher #34279
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change the hard code of newtonsoft package version #34266
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add global and implicit usings #34264
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new

Merged

  • Revert "Allow ResolveReadyToRunCompilers to be run under FreeBSD" #34277
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun

Updated

  • Fix package verification for some valid packages on windows #34144
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 6.0.22
  • Fix package verification for some valid packages on windows #34143
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 6.0.22
  • Don't set UseApphost or SelfContained to true for PublishAot #33229
    Area-External
